title: I could afk every game and the outcome would be 99% the same
body: It doesnt motivate me to play, tbh.

replies.body: so... what you are implying is that you are that terrible of a player that your team would not notice your absence? if you feel that unmotivated to play or even attempt to improve why are you even playing the game to begin with? there are plenty of other games out there. Go take a break and comeback and see if you feel motivated again if not then just stop playing league altogether, no one is forcing you to play league

> what you are implying is that you are that terrible of a player that your team would not notice your absence?

What I'm implying is that 99% of games I cant do shit to win or to lose, it doesnt matter. The game will give me a gold premade and put me vs a high bronze non-premade, can I lose that? omg, no, I cant, unless inting. The game will give me low bronze teammates and will put me vs high silver/gold players, can I win that? no, I cant, most of those games are 0-10 in 10 minutes.

Does it mean that I'm bad? well, who knows?


> no one is forcing you to play league

Yes, I know, I could be playing right now, and I'm not.

> [{quoted}](name=Moetaro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GKjPlYjE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-16T23:12:49.660+0000)

> 
> Does it mean that I'm bad? well, who knows?
> 
> Yes, I know, I could be playing right now, and I'm not.

aka you are that terrible of a player. Sorry but stop making excuses. That is all you are doing. I have beaten people who were placed plat while i am a gold player i have beaten people with diamond borders while i am gold. Your attitude is nothing more than an excuse for you to not try. You are the reason you lose 99% of your games, not because your teammates are bad or the enemies are that much more skilled. You lose because you already decided that you lost the game without even playing it

If I'm such a terrible player, why dont I lose everygame until I reach bronze V or so? I would understand that, and it would motivate me to improve. Why do I keep getting a 53% victories in the last 90 games finding every possible combination of players from low bronze to low plat, in a mix that 99% decides the outcome of the games? and the most annoying thing, it happens in streaks of 80% wins followed by streaks of 30% wins, rinse and repeat and rinse and repeat.

It's not me the one deciding if I win or lose, is the very game. The game decides if I'm going to win or lose even before the picks/bans screen. And that's boooooooring.

Btw, I've beaten diamond players with my bronze border some of the rare times I've found them, you dont need to be a good player to do so. All you need is not to be dumb and 4 teammates good enough to stomp the enemy team (diamond included). That's all.

i don't care whether you win or not, you are a terrible player if you give up before the game even starts. I have won games that are stacked against me, i have lost games that i should have won. Sorry but stop making excuses, you are a terrible player since all you are doing is making lame excuses to not try. Sorry but i don't give a damn about your woes. You either actually try or you just don't. Don't come here complaining and making dumb excuses

> i don't care whether you win or not, you are a terrible player if you give up before the game even starts

pffff, ok man, I didnt read further. Have a nice day.

it hurts to hear the truth right? like i said i don't care if you win or not. You going into a match already expecting to lose is just going to make you lose any chance you have at winning. Negative attitudes are what are causing you to lose not "my team is full of bronze 5s and their team is full of challenger players!" excuses

Genius, look at my last game with janna and tell me how am I supposed to carry playing janna vs a platinum adc, a last season platinum mid and a gold jungler with my  silver 5 adc, my trashy top and mid and my decent but silver jungler. That game is a good proof of how terrible I am and how fair the matchmaking is.


Possitive attitude he said... bite me!

oh noes you lost a game! whatever shall we do!? sorry but you are not going to win every single game in existence sorry but don't come here whining like a baby whenever you lose!

Man, can you read? You should go to school again, if you ever left it. I'm not complaining about winning or losing, I give 0 fucks about that, I'm complaining about matchmaking, that is UTTER SHIT. Do you understand it? or do you need a sketch?

you should also go to school, i don't give a damn about you or your normal game woes. You are not going to win every single game so keep crying and whining like a baby all you want. Look how many fucks i give
You give enough fucks to come here and never shut the f up.

> [{quoted}](name=Moetaro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GKjPlYjE,comment-id=000200000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-17T23:35:34.351+0000)

waaaaaa! RITO PLOX MY NORMAL MATCHMAKING!!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Moetaro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GKjPlYjE,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-17T23:42:36.579+0000)
>
> Man, you need a woman, seriously, and you need her with urgency.

RITO PLOX!!!! MY NORMAL MATCHMAKING!!!!!! WAAAAAAAA!
Man, you need a woman, seriously, and you need her with urgency.

That doesn't really make any logical sense. The chance of you winning in a 4v5 are extremely small, probably less than 10%. So what you're basically saying is that when you actually play rather than afk you only have a 10% win rate, which is also absurd. Your post is basically you whining about how the sky is pink when the sky is clearly blue.

Also, forgot to mention, since setting goals lets you track your own progress you'll have a better understanding of when you can help your team and make  huge impct and when you need to play safer because you are behind nd can't afford to fall further behind.

The way it works out is when you are close to your skill level you feel less impactful in your game. This is when it i a good time to take  break from ranked and mix things up in some normals until you improve. It is actually possible to impact a game so much you turn wht would/should hve been  loss into a win which is what causes you to climb the ladder. In order to consisently make this sort of impact you need to be much better than the other 9 players in your game. If you are  gold 5 player in silver  1 it could easily take 30-50 games to go from 1 to G5. If you are  P5 player in S1 it would take 7-10 games, maybe less if LP gains are high enough by the time the P5 player got to S1.

I dont agree, most of the games I play (win or lose, it doesnt matter) are like 10-0 or 1-10 in 10 minutes, as I said. You can try to carry this, but the truth is that most of the time you will not do anything but getting things even worse, because the advantage they have at this point makes you unable to carry shit, so when trying to carry you will take risks, and those risks will dig your grave even deeper.

Can a platinum player carry 4 high bronze vs 4 mid golds and 1 high silver? I can tell you, most of them CANT. You know why I know? because I've been there, and I've seen the platinum players failing horribly.

> [{quoted}](name=Moetaro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GKjPlYjE,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-02-16T23:29:42.663+0000)
>
> I dont agree, most of the games I play (win or lose, it doesnt matter) are like 10-0 or 1-10 in 10 minutes, as I said. You can try to carry this, but the truth is that most of the time you will not do anything but getting things even worse, because the advantage they have at this point makes you unable to carry shit, so when trying to carry you will take risks, and those risks will dig your grave even deeper.
> 
> Can a platinum player carry 4 high bronze vs 4 mid golds and 1 high silver? I can tell you, most of them CANT. You know why I know? because I've been there, and I've seen the platinum players failing horribly.

I have 2 smurf, 1 is new and in silver 1 with mid gold mmr and another that is gold 3 with mid plat mmr and on both accounts I feel lke I easily have 100% control over the game. On the silver account all 4 of my team mates can feed their asses off (and they usually do) but at some point I'll always be so far ahead that I make the enemy team rage. On my Gold account I have to put in a little more effort, I can't do the troll all damage build as much, but even if all 4 of my team mates fail horribly, as long as I don\t follow up on their bad plys and put myelf behind, I'll get far enough ahead in late game to just stomp a team fight. THe closer I get to my rank the more seriously I need to take the game nd the more I gotta try. The further I am from my rank the more I can just mess around and do completely retarded builds and still easily win. On my silver account I could even tower dive and pretty much feed the first 10 minutes of the game nd still crry it. But I am not plat, I am multi season diamond.

Not the same a plat player as a multiseason diamond.

Still, if a multiseason diamond struggles to carry gold players being smashed, imagine how it is for a silver elo player to carry vs 3 golds 2 silvers when your team is bronze. Well, I just cant, I just ff and move on.

Well, that's mostly all the games I lose. And that's mostly all the games I win too, but in those games the golds are in my team and the bronzes in the oposite team. So.... boooring. Yes, once in a blue moon I get an even match, and those matches decide whether I raise my elo or not, just... well, just that's not enough to get fun, most of the games are boring unstopable stomps (win or lose).

> [{quoted}](name=Moetaro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GKjPlYjE,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-17T00:15:24.900+0000)

Yes, every blue moon I get an even match, and those matches decide wheter I raise my elo or not, just... well, just that's not enough to get fun, most of the games are boring unstopable stomps (win or lose).

Not sure what part of my comment stated anything about struggling to carry gold players being smashed, but I'm telling you, once you get better the games legit get easier. THe trick is to not buy into your team mate's bad plays and set goals. Goals should include things like "I should be X level or higher by Y minutes." or "I should be on my X item by Y minutes." After you set goal like that they become easier and easier to achieve which lets you move the Y down.

Thank you very much for the advices.

I had realized this one 

> THe trick is to not buy into your team mate's bad plays

But I still buy into every bad move my team make (plus the bad moves I make, ofc). I need to recognize mistakes better, not only not to make them, but not to buy into them too. It's no easy.

I'll try the goals thing, I have never tought about that, maybe it will work.

> [{quoted}](name=Moetaro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GKjPlYjE,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-17T00:34:32.339+0000)
>
> Thank you very much for the advices.
> 
> I had realized this one 
> 
> But I still buy into every bad move my team make (plus the bad moves I make, ofc). I need to recognize mistakes better, not only not to make them, but not to buy into them too. It's no easy.
> 
> I'll try the goals thing, I have never tought about that, maybe it will work.

Not buying into mistakes takes optimizing your decision making. Setting goals makes the game so much fun IMO. Without goals it is really hard to judge wheher or not YOU are doing well or not, you can only see how your TEAM is doing. Whwn you have goals you can track your own progression. Go to  game where you did well and set the goals based off that game. As you get better at hitting those goals consider revising them to make them harder to hit. I guarantee this will change your thoughts on how to play league.

Then stop playing the game competitively and only play TT or ARAM? That or simply only play during the gamemodes. If you take a break from the game only to come back for the gamemodes. You'll at least be relaxed and have had a small break.
if you're unmotivated to play just find another game, if i ever get bored with league i read a book or switch to whatever indie game i could pick up for sale on steam
